cause.description:
Some will try to for peace or the end of world hunger, but what about egos? Who will fight against these dastardly fiends who refuse to answer there phones? I will! I hope you will join in this fight!
1. Phone screening consistently is hurtful.
2. Those who ignore wish a plague upon their own house.
cause.mission: destroy those who ignore the phone calls of their friends because they think they are better than everyone.
cause.name: Fighting ignored phone calls
